scripts.docs:build: rescript build; cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' pnpm dogumentation build
scripts.docs: rescript clean && rescript build; concurrently --names 'wp,bs' -c 'bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold' 'rescript build -w' ' cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' pnpm dogumentation start --entry=./example/Demo.bs.js'
